item.title: Teaching
item.description:
CEE 260/MIE 273: Probability and Statistics for Engineers

This is a core undergraduate course for civil/mechanical/industrial engineering majors at UMass Amherst. (Course website).

Semesters taught: Fall 2019, 2020, 2021, 2024, 2025.

CEE 601: Machine Learning Foundations and Applications

Semesters taught: Fall 2023, Spring 2025

CEE 616: Probabilistic Machine Learning

(Formerly CEE 697M: Big Data and Machine Learning for Engineers.) This is a graduate course that delves into the theory of machine learning from a probabilistic perspective, broadly divided into supervised learning, unsupervised learning and neural networks. Semesters taught: Spring 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023; Fall 2025
